group_1.narration: So long as their voices resound together,@singing, praying, believing in hope,@even if she feels worried,@the goddess shall not break this "special" record.
Just as there are singing voices "I know not",@perhaps there is happiness I too "know not"?
Happiness remains happiness,@feelings remain feelings,@wishes remain wishes.
Prayers remain hope.@Only despair they need not.
Until the time comes@that these prayers break,@the goddess shall watch over them.
Even if they be painful,@difficult, stressful, miserable,@so long as these singing voices@spin the "special" record with hope,@she dare not break it.
The goddess, unable to give her song of blessing,@can only speak in a gentle voice.
I know, right now@you are fighting a difficult and painful battle.
I know not what future you will follow...
Of so many universes,@there is proof of but one strange universe within...
But you know, looking at it another way,@all of you can open the future yourselves.@This universe is one without a singular fate.
So do not lose,@no matter how painful it may be.
Because I'm sure, someday,@you will be able to create a future of salvation.
Today, the "special" record began redoing its engraving.
What kind of record will it become?
